alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Payne (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 02 at 7:01PM CDT until May 02 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR LINCOLN...EAST CENTRAL OKLAHOMA AND SOUTHEASTERN PAYNE COUNTIES... At 701 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles southwest of Drumright to 4 miles west of Sparks, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Chandler, Stroud, Davenport, Wellston, Carney, Sparks, Warwick, Kendrick, Avery and Parkland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A tornado watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
